sentences.sContent: Not that hoary old chestnut (= old idea, joke, remark etc ) again.
sentences.sCn: 别再说那老掉牙的话了。

synos.tran: 久远的，古老的；[植][动]灰白的

remMethod.val: “好理” → 头发灰白， 该好好整理了 → 灰白的

trans.tranOther: a hoary joke, remark etc is so well-known that people no longer find it amusing or interesting
